rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg001
rows.name:
Look at that!
Isn't that sunset beautiful...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg002
rows.name: It was worth coming all this way...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg003
rows.name:
It's one of those things that stays in
your mind forever after you've seen it.
It's like I can't take my eyes off it.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg005
rows.name: Huh, what's that[ML:Dash ]?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg006
rows.name: The sky seems to be getting cloudier...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg007
rows.name:
Hmm, I might be a bit of a
rain magnet...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg008
rows.name:
The weather was perfectly clear,
but then suddenly it rains...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg009
rows.name:
I've even had snow, sleet, and hail
come down which is why I think I might be
a rain magnet.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg010
rows.name:
But getting to enjoy two different views
at once is quite a bargain,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg011
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg012
rows.name: You're always so positive, Kasane.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg013
rows.name:
Maybe you should get the mask
on your back exorcised.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg014
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg015
rows.name: You're such a positive person, Kasane.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg016
rows.name:
You might want to have that mask on your
back exorcised by a priest, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg017
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg018
rows.name: You're always so positive, Kasane.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg019
rows.name:
It might be a good idea to get that mask
on your back exorcised by a priest.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg020
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg021
rows.name: Ya always stay positive, don't ya, Kasane

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg022
rows.name:
Ain't it better to get that mask on your
back exorcised or somethin'?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg023
rows.name:
Yes, I always stay positive,
no matter what!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg024
rows.name:
Even when the beautiful sunset
we came to see gets ruined by the rain...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg025
rows.name:
Even when the lucky charm I just
bought recently broke in half
the very next day...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg026
rows.name: I want to maintain a positive attitude.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg027
rows.name:
I believe that happiness comes
to those who keep moving forward
no matter how difficult things get.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg028
rows.name:
And if my Driver is going through
something sad I think my positive
attitude might offer a little comfort.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg029
rows.name:
That's what Blades are for,
supporting their Drivers!
Don't you agree?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg030
rows.name: What!?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg031
rows.name: Don't you think this mask is cute?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg032
rows.name:
I thought it was really charming
though!?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg033
rows.name:
Besides, it brings me good luck! Getting
it exorcised would be outrageous!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg034
rows.name:
Well...
But when I see you in battle
I sometimes get a bit scared.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg035
rows.name:
You put on that mask and
attack your opponents mercilessly.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg036
rows.name:
No no.
You definitely should get it exorcised.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg037
rows.name:
When you put on that mask in battle
you become like a different person and
pummel the enemy relentlessly, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg038
rows.name:
Hmm...
I suppose you won't realize it
unless someone tells you directly...

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg039
rows.name:
Kasane, you act a bit strangely in
battle. With that mask on, you attack
enemies you go a little berserk.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg040
rows.name:
Yeah, but when you're in battle
you give off this really sinister aura.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg041
rows.name:
Sometimes when you put on that mask
you really thrash the enemies
to pieces.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg042
rows.name: Ahahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg043
rows.name: I would never do something like that!

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg045
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg046
rows.name:
But sometimes I do get really caught up
in battle and I don't really remember
much afterward.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg047
rows.name:
But I'm sure it's just because
I'm extremely focused.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg048
rows.name:
It takes enormous concentration
to keep everyone safe, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg049
rows.name: I'm absolutely lost in the moment.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg051
rows.name:
Well then... the rain is getting heavier
It's a shame but we should
probably head back now.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg052
rows.name:
I'm so glad I came here with you today
I had a wonderful time, thanks to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg054
rows.name: I'm really lucky, aren't I?

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg055
rows.name:
To be able to be with
such a great Driver
and wonderful companions.

rows.label: kizunatalk061_msg056
rows.name:
Let's do our best to spread this
happiness all around the world and
become even happier ourselves!
